page.title: 11LOCAL NEWSPAPER S.CROYDON
page.content: We visited the"Croydon Advertiser" on 6th june.We met a reporter called Cathy Gallagher.She took us to Mr.Collard who is the executive editor.We interviewed him, and had our photographs taken by the chief photographer,Colin Woodcock. We went to the typing room to see the typists at work.Then we saw some very skilled people cut articles to the right size to fit into the newspaper.Then we saw strips of paper with holes in which were put into a computerised machine.That turned into a whole article for printing.We went into the dark room and saw our photos developed on a special machine which could make the photo any size.The "Advertiser" is the main local newspaper for the Croydon area.
